alert.note: Alert for Great Salt Lake Desert and Mountains (Utah) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Winter Storm Warning issued February 22 at 2:05AM MST until February 22 at 8:00PM MST by NWS Saltlake
info.description: ...WINTER STORM WARNING REMAINS IN EFFECT UNTIL 8 PM MST THIS EVENING... * WHAT...Heavy snow. Additional snow accumulations of up to 5 inches eastern portion from near Dugway and east. Winds gusting as high as 50 mph. * WHERE...Great Salt Lake Desert and Mountains. * WHEN...Until 8 PM MST this evening. * IMPACTS...Winter driving conditions are expected on SR-196, SR- 199 and I-80, especially from Knolls to Grantsville. Gusty winds will cause areas of blowing and drifting snow.
info.instruction: If you must travel, keep an extra flashlight, food, and water in your vehicle in case of an emergency. For graphical depictions of the snowfall forecast, including Official NWS Forecast, High End Amount, and Low End Amount, visit weather.gov/slc/winter. For winter road conditions from the Utah Department of Transportation, visit http://www.udottraffic.utah.gov/roadweatherforecast.aspx.
